title: Front End Developer
blurb: Front End Developer at a Product-Analytics software company based in Raleigh
points: Generated new features for clients by working closely with designers and developers to develop new, reusable VueJS solutions.
Decreased accessibility violations by planning and executing accessibility improvements in a shared components library.
Mitigated technical debt by creating in-house code solutions in areas that required third-party dependencies.
Improved documentation and code reliability by implementing Cypress and Storybook testing with automated accessibility scanning.

title: Front End Developer
blurb: Front End Developer at an Austin-based startup
points: Improved client UX experience by revamping legacy AngularJS views to VueJS with improved UX experiences.
Reduced code risk by leveraging Vue Test Utils, Jest, Mocha, and Chai to build test infrastructure against previously untested code.
Fastened load times and reduced tech debt by porting legacy AngularJS UI code to meet modern needs.

title: Associate Software Developer - Middleware
blurb: JavaScript Developer at an Austin-based startup
points: Improved customer efficiencies by developing JavaScript software integrations to provide several large CRMs, such as Salesforce and Infusionsoft.
Produced secure login experiences by building integrations with OAuth functionality, from Google OAuth to client-specific OAuth implementations.
Decreased bugs in legacy client code by writing AngularJS code and new tests to ensure minimal bugs and increased functionality.
